caption.p: Spatial distribution of partial correlation coefficient ( r) between annual ET and ( a) P, ( b) PET and ( c) LAI, and ( d) the dominant factors of the ET trend in the entire region in the LP from 2000 to 2012. Map was created using ArcMap 10.0 ( http://www.esri.com/sofware/arcgis/arcgis-for-desktop).
